fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Symphony of Chaos:** Each night, you can choose a player to serenade with a discordant tune, causing confusion and disarray. The target player's actions will be randomly redirected to another player of your choosing. This ability bypasses most forms of protection.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, **Euphoric Crescendo:** On these days, your Symphony of Chaos gains additional power. The redirection effect will occur twice, targeting two different players instead of one.
- **Enchanting Overture:** You have an enchanting presence that captivates the town, granting you immunity to role blocks and basic attacks. However, you can still be killed by powerful or unstoppable attacks.
